cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)CP. (64) 12 COPY NO. 0..U9th January, 1964CABINETMULTILATERAL FORCE: EXPERIMENT IN MECED-MANNINGNote by the Secretary of the cabinet it became necessary at short notice today to authoriseSir Evelyn Shuckburgh to inform the Multilateral Force Working group in Paris whether, and to what extent, the United Kingdom Governmentwould be prepared to participate in the experimental mixed-manning ofa United States destroyer (C. C. (63) 60th Conclusions, Minute 2).The Prime Minister would like his colleagues to know that, inagreement with the Foreign Secretary and the Minister of Defence, hehas authorised Sir Evelyn Shuckburgh to say that the BritishGovernment are prepared to contribute two officers and thirty ratingsto the mixed-manned destroyer. This decision does not entail any commitment as to United Kingdom participation in the NATO Multi-lateral Nuclear Force itself.(Signed) BURKE trend cabinet Office, S. W. 1.9th January, 1964
